explains: adj. 有营养的，营养丰富的

sentences.en: It is always important to choose enjoyable, nutritious foods.
sentences.cn: 选择好吃的、有营养的食品总是很重要的。

sentences.en: Nectarine is a nutritious fruit and is welcomed by consumers.
sentences.cn: 油桃是一种营养丰富的水果，深受消费者欢迎。

sentences.en: Junk foods are anything but nutritious, so students should avoid them.
sentences.cn: 垃圾食品根本没有营养，因此学生要避免吃垃圾食品。
